name: Slot Idler
description:
Slot Idler is an IDLE game featuring fruitmachines.

Ever wanted to know what would happen if you threw a lot of cash into a slotmachine? Here's your chance.

Sit back, watch the reels spin, hear the sounds and become mesmerized.

Features:
- five popular slotmachines, each with different gameplay.
- authentic sounds where possible.
- authentic gameplay behaviour.
- 50 achievements; some require an insane amount of playing and luck.

Note:
- The game plays itself, after 25 manual clicks (per machine) you can lock the start-button and sit back.
- There is no way to influence the outcome of the game, it is a slotmachine afterall.
- Game runs in a small fixed size window. No scaling. No full screen.
- Put it in the corner of your desktop while you do something else.
- There is no real money involved.

Future:
- New machines will be added depending on succes/demand.
